scripts.uglify: uglifyjs scripts-es6/*.js -m -o public/js/datepicker.js && uglifyjs scripts-es6/*.js -m -c -o public/js/datepicker.min.js
scripts.build:css: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build:js: npm run lint && npm run compile && npm run uglify
scripts.uglify:dev: uglifyjs scripts-es6/*.js -o public/js/datepicker.js && uglifyjs scripts-es6/*.js -c -o public/js/datepicker.min.js
scripts.build:css:dev: npm run scss:dev && npm run autoprefixer:dev
scripts.build:js:dev: npm run lint && npm run compile && npm run uglify:dev
scripts.watch:css:dev: onchange 'scss/*.scss' -- onerror 'npm run build:css:dev' --title "Error building SCSS" --icon error
scripts.watch:js:dev: onchange 'scripts-es6/*.es' -- onerror 'npm run build:js:dev' --title "Error building JS" --icon error
